desc.en: Zhanjiang Rail Transit is an urban rail transit system located in Zhanjiang City, Guangdong Province, China. The planned area covers the administrative regions under the jurisdiction of the city such as Chikan, Xiashan, Pootou, Mazhang and Zhanjiang Economic Development Zone, with a total area of approximately 1,705.3 square kilometers.In July 2024, the Natural Resources Bureau of Zhanjiang City released the "Revised Specialized Planning for Urban Rail Transit of Zhanjiang City", clearly stating that the short-term planning period is up to 2035 and the long-term period is up to 2050. The vision (2050) is to expand the network to 8 lines, with a total length of 297.8 kilometers. Among them, the total length of newly added express lines will be 105.8 kilometers, and the total length of regular lines will be 192 kilometers, including Lines 7 and 8.
desc.zh: 湛江轨道交通（Zhanjiang Rail Transit）是位于中国广东省湛江市的城市轨道交通系统，规划范围覆盖赤坎、霞山、坡头、麻章、湛江经开区等市辖行政区域，总面积约1705.3平方公里。2024年7月，湛江市自然资源局发布《湛江市城市轨道交通专项规划修编》，明确近期规划年限至2035年，远期至2050年。远景（2050年）线网规模扩大至8条线路，总长度达297.8公里，其中新增快线总长105.8公里，普线总长192公里，包含7、8号线。
